section.title: Commit Changes and Run the Configuration Processor
section.para: Commit your changes with the input model and the required configuration values added to the pass_through.yml and nsx/nsx_config.yml files.
section.screen: &prompt.ardana;cd ~/openstack/my_cloud/definition &prompt.ardana;git commit -A -m "Configuration changes for NSX deployment" &prompt.ardana;cd ~/openstack/ardana/ansible &prompt.ardana;ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost config-processor-run.yml \ -e \encrypt="" -e rekey=""
section.para: If the playbook config-processor-run.yml fails, there is an error in the input model. Fix the error and repeat the above steps.
